SELECT lc.like_comment_id , lc.user_fk , u.account_name , u.user_photo_path , ltt.timeline_fk , lc.is_like , lc.comment , lc.comment_like_count , lc.actioned_time , lc.has_noticed , lc.is_read , (CASE WHEN joinedltlc.like_comment_id is null THEN false ELSE true END) AS is_my_like, lc.comment_deleted FROM like_comments AS lc JOIN links_to_timeline AS ltt ON ltt.like_comment_fk = lc.like_comment_id LEFT JOIN users AS u ON lc.user_fk = u.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM links_to_like_comment AS ltlc LEFT JOIN like_comments AS lc2 ON ltlc.like_comment_fk2 = lc2.like_comment_id WHERE user_fk = #{userId} AND is_like = TRUE ) AS joinedltlc ON lc.like_comment_id = joinedltlc.like_comment_fk1 WHERE ltt.timeline_fk = #{id} AND lc.comment IS NOT NULL AND lc.comment_deleted = false ORDER BY lc.like_comment_id ASC

SELECT lc.like_comment_id , lc.user_fk , u.account_name , u.user_photo_path , ltr.review_fk , lc.is_like , lc.comment , lc.comment_like_count , lc.actioned_time , lc.has_noticed , lc.is_read , (CASE WHEN joinedltlc.like_comment_id is null THEN false ELSE true END) AS is_my_like, lc.comment_deleted FROM like_comments AS lc JOIN links_to_review AS ltr ON ltr.like_comment_fk = lc.like_comment_id LEFT JOIN users AS u ON lc.user_fk = u.user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM links_to_like_comment AS ltlc LEFT JOIN like_comments AS lc2 ON ltlc.like_comment_fk2 = lc2.like_comment_id WHERE user_fk = #{userId} AND is_like = TRUE ) AS joinedltlc ON lc.like_comment_id = joinedltlc.like_comment_fk1 WHERE ltr.review_fk = #{id} AND lc.comment IS NOT NULL AND lc.comment_deleted = false ORDER BY lc.like_comment_id ASC

SELECT lc.like_comment_id , lc.user_fk , u.account_name , u.user_photo_path , lc.is_like , lc.comment , ltt.timeline_fk , tl.timeline_sentence, ltr.review_fk , rv.review_sentence, ltlc.like_comment_fk1, parentLC.comment AS parent_comment_sentence, lc.actioned_time , lc.has_noticed , lc.is_read FROM like_comments AS lc LEFT JOIN links_to_timeline AS ltt ON lc.like_comment_id = ltt.like_comment_fk LEFT JOIN timelines AS tl ON ltt.timeline_fk = tl.timeline_id LEFT JOIN links_to_review AS ltr ON lc.like_comment_id = ltr.like_comment_fk LEFT JOIN reviews AS rv ON ltr.review_fk = rv.review_id LEFT JOIN links_to_like_comment AS ltlc ON lc.like_comment_id = ltlc.like_comment_fk2 LEFT JOIN like_comments AS parentLC ON ltlc.like_comment_fk1 = parentLC.like_comment_id LEFT JOIN users AS u ON lc.user_fk = u.user_id WHERE tl.user_fk = #{id} OR rv.user_fk = #{id} OR parentLC.user_fk = #{id} ORDER BY lc.actioned_time DESC LIMIT 50

SELECT com.like_comment_id , com.user_fk , u.account_name , u.user_photo_path , com.is_like , com.comment , com.comment_like_count , com.actioned_time , com.has_noticed , com.is_read , (CASE WHEN my_likes.like_comment_id is null THEN false ELSE true END) AS is_my_like, com.comment_deleted FROM like_comments AS com LEFT JOIN users AS u ON com.user_fk = u.user_id
LEFT JOIN ( (SELECT * FROM like_comments WHERE user_fk = 1 AND is_like = true ) AS my_likes #visitingUserId LEFT JOIN links_to_like_comment AS l_my_like ON my_likes.like_comment_id = l_my_like.like_comment_fk2 ) ON l_my_like.like_comment_fk1 = com.like_comment_id
